title: Hecatonphila. The arte of loue Or, loue discouered in an hundred seuerall kindes.
author: Alberti, Leon Battista, 1404-1472.
publisher: By P. S[hort] for William Leake: and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Greyhound,
notes: Running title reads: The arte of loue.
